channel.title: How do i play on people servers
channel.description:
hey i need help how to play on other people-servers like if i want to play on shankscape how do i play on that server.
ps: im new to moparscape[br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2007, 01:27:54 PM[/size][hr]anybody?

item.title: How do i play on people servers
item.dc:creator: @ownj00pl0x ownj00pl0x
item.description:
@ownj00pl0x wrote:

Okay for one, if you do not have Hamachi downloaded, then you can not play on Hamachi Servers… You need to find a server on the advertisement page, and then look around for a server to play on… Pull up Moparscape.org and then go to the top left and click on file and then click new server (ie. shankscape.no-ip.org) then do the same for the port (ie. 43594) and then then you can type in any username or password to log in. By the way, the servername and port that I used was just made up…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i play on people servers
